text:
In ep 13 of Cannabis Voices I speak to the very inspirational Michelle Kendall, who shares her journey of using #cannabis to treat her ovarian #cancer in her documentary @schedule1movie #cannabisismedicine
Website: https://t.co/LMKyJ54MYd
Apple podcasts: https://t.co/b3rRhdgy1W https://t.co/0oHAnUdHIT
